Record.ClassificationPath: Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Physiological Effects of Drugs/Hormones, Hormone Substitutes, and Hormone Antagonists/Hormones/Anabolic Agents
Record.BroaderTerm: Hormones, Hormone Substitutes, and Hormone Antagonists
Record.Description: These compounds stimulate anabolism and inhibit catabolism. They stimulate the development of muscle mass, strength, and power.
